DataElement.preferredName: Disease Status Evaluation Current Report Period Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made about the state of any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected described during the present reporting interval.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease Status Evaluation Current Report Period
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The state of any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected described during the present reporting interval.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.:A condition or state at a particular time.:Evaluation; the act of placing value on something.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.
A condition or state at a particular time.
Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:Report; a short account.:An interval of time. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
A short textual account; having provided a short account.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 8/29/17 jk transferred context and added registration status,CSI per Round 5 finalization task.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.
